instructions.ecoInvestorSubtitle: Your investment will be used to funding projects related to renewable energy, waste management, wastewater treatment, organic farming and other environmentally critical areas!

greenBonds.title: What are green bonds?
greenBonds.descriptionFirst: In accordance with the International Capital Market Association (ICMA), Green bonds are debt securities designated to finance green projects to protect environment.
greenBonds.descriptionSecond: Doscredobank’s Green Bonds are the securities of a stable, dynamic, and reliable company, providing high-interest income on a quarterly basis.

bondIssuer.title: Who is the bond issuer?
bondIssuer.description: It is an issuing company that has received a security authorization of the Service for Regulation and Supervision of the Financial Market under the Ministry of Economy and Commerce of the Kyrgyz Republic

advantages.title: What are the advantages of green bonds for investors?
advantages.descriptionFirst: Ability to finance environmental projects with transparent and traceable funds;
advantages.descriptionThird: Building and strengthening an investor’s reputation in environmental efforts and responsible financing of sustainable projects
advantages.descriptionFourth: Sustainable development factors are crucial in decision making to timely mitigate the long-term possible investment risks.

bondMethods.title: How are the bonds issued?
bondMethods.description: Under the current legislation, bonds are issued in the form of records in the independent registry and have only an undocumented type.

receiveInterest.title: How do you receive interest on bonds?
receiveInterest.description: Interest of 16% per annum is accrued quarterly to the settlement account with the possibility of withdrawal in cash or transfer to the bank payment card.

buyback.title: Can the issuer approach to buyback its own bonds before maturity?
buyback.description: The conditions and terms of this procedure are specified in the offering memorandum and conditions of public offer of bonds of the respective issuer.

contacts.title: Where can I learn more about green bonds of Doscredobank?
contacts.description: To get more detailed information about the bonds, you can apply to the office of the Finance Company “Senti”, or any of the nearest offices of Doscredobank.
contacts.branches: You can find the bank’s branch addresses
